oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forensic Science Education and Training in Hong Kong – Opportunities and Potential Challenges
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mak, Suen-yui Deejay
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forensic Science
education
hong kong
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of this paper is to describe the Forensic Science Education and Training in Hong Kong as in 2023, Tung Wah College launched the first and only bachelor's degree in forensic science, marking a significant milestone in the academic history of both the institution and Hong Kong. Opportunities and potential challenges of forensic science are also discussed in Hong Kong.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Council of Forensic Science Education
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: The Journal of Forensic Science Education; Vol. 6 No. 2 (2024): Journal of Forensic Science Education
